entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow inland overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Snow inland early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
